liurenjie1024 commented on pull request #5143: ARROW-4752: [Rust] Add explicit SIMD vectorization for the divide kernel
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5143#discussion_r319717518
 
 

 ##########
 File path: rust/arrow/src/compute/kernels/arithmetic.rs
 ##########
 @@ -197,8 +263,13 @@ where
         + Sub<Output = T::Native>
         + Mul<Output = T::Native>
         + Div<Output = T::Native>
-        + Zero,
+        + Zero
+        + One,
 {
+    #[cfg(any(target_arch = "x86", target_arch = "x86_64"))]
+    return simd_divide(&left, &right);
 
 Review comment:
   Is it more readable to use the 
   `if cfg!`
   pattern?
